channel.title: Do I need an upgrade?
channel.description:
[img]http://www.atkoli.com/screenshot/o7oti5.png[/img]
[img]http://www.atkoli.com/screenshot/yo27fx.png[/img]
[img]http://www.atkoli.com/screenshot/68m8kd.png[/img]
Got it back in september 2008 so its 3 years old now, I added a GTS 250 last year so I could benefit from CUDA (didnt have much money at the time)

item.title: Do I need an upgrade?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Niall:

that reminds me, I was supposed to get a serial with my card but I never got one

Yea, I had to fight newegg two times to get my serial number.

item.title: Do I need an upgrade?
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:5, topic:421913”][quote author=Ollie link=topic=524595.msg3817829#msg3817829 date=1321499696]
how much are decent cards these days?
[/quote]
MSI GeForce GTX 560, for $169 after a $20 rebate, and it came with 2 coupons for free games (batman arkham city and Operation Flashpoint: Red River) that I plan to sell. (offtopic, anyone know a good place to sell them?)[/quote]
Let me know if you do find a place to sell, my graphics card came with an arkham city serial too and I haven’t played it.

Read full topic

item.title: Do I need an upgrade?
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

if you’re going to get a 560 then the ti edition is much better and shouldn’t cost that much more

Read full topic

item.title: Do I need an upgrade?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Ollie:

how much are decent cards these days?

I just bought this:

http://www.newegg.com/Product/Product.aspx?Item=N82E16814127592

MSI GeForce GTX 560, for $169 after a $20 rebate, and it came with 2 coupons for free games (batman arkham city and Operation Flashpoint: Red River) that I plan to sell. (offtopic, anyone know a good place to sell them?)

I thought that was a pretty good deal.

Read full topic

item.title: Do I need an upgrade?
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

[quote=“Ollie, post:3, topic:421913”]Yea its quite a shame I didn’t have much money when I needed it, Its not very good. overheats lots and is extremely loud, how much are decent cards these days?[/quote]Nvidia GTX 560 is just below 200 euros and performs great. I was on a GTX 275 before, and i agree. The 2xx-series are really loud and warm. When i upgraded to my GTX 580 not long ago, the difference was mind blowing. Now i barely hear my card even at load, and it’s way cooler.

Read full topic
